'''Kelly Jones''' is [[Alex Jones|Alex]]'s ex-wife, and the mother of 3 of his children. After their divorce in 2013, Kelly and Alex have become embroiled in an ongoing and bitter custody battle<ref>https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9304767/Watch-conspiracy-theorist-Alex-Jones-taunts-wife-circling-home-helicopter.html</ref>.

Kelly has become a frequent and vocal critic of Alex Jones. She is prone to making hyperbolic claims about Alex on twitter, so it can be difficult to trust some of her factual claims. Kelly was deeply involved in InfoWars rise to prominence, including making most of Alex's most famous documentaries.

In mid 2022, during [[InfoW et. al. Bankruptcy Case|the InfoW Bankruptcy case]], Kelly mildly disrupted a hearing by making some pretty wild claims in the chat (and publicly on Twitter) and posting screen-captures of the courtroom on twitter<ref>https://twitter.com/RealKellyJones/status/1520146734130864128?cxt=HHwWgIC55dHZ0pgqAAAA</ref>.
